data.eml:eml: Revision of the type series of Empis (Planempis) mandarina Frey, the type species of Planempis (Diptera: Empididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saigusa, Toyohei (2012): Revision of the type series of Empis (Planempis) mandarina Frey, the type species of Planempis (Diptera: Empididae). Zootaxa 3353: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281568
